entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE EVENING, THEN SNOW LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
NEW LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 50 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW, SLEET AND RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN, SLEET WITH A CHANCE OF FREEZING RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

RAIN AND SLEET LIKELY IN THE EVENING
CLOUDY
LITTLE OR NO SLEET ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 15 TO 20
HIGHS AROUND 40

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS AROUND 50
